blacksmith_greetings: ^0: "Hello Mylo, I hope you're doing well, the village is not by the way."

c-0: ^0: "The slimes really destroyed a lot of the property in the village."

mylo: ^1: "Yes I am doing well. I was fighting against the slimes at the Main gate but"
mylo2: ^1: "I got knocked out, Thanks to Lyra and Kuro they both took good care of me."

c-0: ^1: "Speaking of which, have you seen Kuro around? I am not able to find him."

blacksmith: ^0: "No. I have not seen him since the devastation of this village."
blacksmith2: ^0: "Although, I need some help from you Mylo, can you go to the Gooey Forest and"
blacksmith3: ^0: "bring my gear? I will make sure your efforts dont go in vain!"

c-0: ^1: "Yes I would like to help you! Just keep my reward ready"

completion: ^0: "Okay, Thank you Mylo, see you around!"
